title: Preparing your child for school. Parts 1 & 2
creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, Glenn McIver, Trevor Lunn and Healthsharing Women. Publishing and Production Group
brief_description: Part 1. Discussion is centered on helping children handle being separated from their parents, relating to other children and adults, gaining independence and responsibility in new situations and encouraging curiosity and confidence. Part 2. Encompasses a number of practical considerations which parents will find helpful in preparing their child for school, such as clothing, lunches and school bags.
